This template will deploy a primary, DTU-based SQL database, and a secondary, serverless SQL database. The primary database will be created with a Standard SKU, while the secondary database will be created with a GeneralPurpose SKU. The secondary database will be created as a free database, and will be automatically paused after an hour of inactivity. The databases will be created in the same location as the resource group.
